pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gerbera is a UPnP media server which allows you to stream your digital media through your home network and consume it on a variety of UPnP compatible devices.

use.flag: Support YouTube and external media sources (e.g. internet radio)
Use libmagic to determine file types
Use dev-db/mysql as backend rather than SQLite3
Use media-libs/taglib for reading files' metadata rather than id3lib
